title: Search While Indexing
subheading: How to search all files while indexing

contents.Text: [[[strong:Settings -> Config -> Use Legacy Search:]]] Set this setting to on while you are indexing a directory. This will allow you to search all files using the old search implementation that works by scanning the entire directory and returning results.
Make sure to turn this setting off after indexing if you want a more efficient search with new features like: (length:>=2m).
